Package no.ntnu.idatt1005.foodi.model.daos

Class ShoppingListDao

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1005.foodi.model.daos.ShoppingListDao
public class ShoppingListDao extends Object
This class is responsible for handling the usage of database operations regarding shopping lists.
Version:
0.9.0
Author:
Snake727

  • Constructor Details

    • ShoppingListDao

      public ShoppingListDao()

  • Method Details

    • clearShoppingList

      public void clearShoppingList(int userId)
      Deletes all shopping list entries for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user.

    • addRecipe

      public void addRecipe(int userId, int recipeId, int portions)
      Adds a recipe to the shopping list by inserting the parameters into the shopping list table. This method also checks if the recipe is already in the shopping list, and if so, updates the portions.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user to add a recipe to the shopping list for.
      recipeId - the id of the recipe to add to the shopping list.
      portions - the amount of portions for the recipe.

    • deleteRecipe

      public void deleteRecipe(int userId, int recipeId)
      Deletes a recipe from the shopping list.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user to remove a recipe from the shopping list for.
      recipeId - the id of the recipe to remove from the shopping list.

    • getRecipesWithIngredients

      public List<RecipeWithPartiallyRemovedIngredients> getRecipesWithIngredients(int userId)
      Returns a list of RecipeWithIngredient objects containing all the recipes with their ingredients in the shopping list. This method also scales each ingredient in every recipe by the amount of portions.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user to retrieve the shopping list for.
      Returns:
      a list of RecipeWithIngredient objects.

    • addShoppingListToInventory

      public void addShoppingListToInventory(int userId)
      Adds all the ingredients from the recipes from the shopping list to the inventory of given user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user to add the shopping list to the inventory for.

    • getTotalIngredients

      public List<AmountedIngredient> getTotalIngredients(int userId)
      Returns a list of AmountedIngredient objects containing all the ingredients in the shopping list. The list returns a summed amount of each ingredient.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user to retrieve the list from.
      Returns:
      a list of AmountedIngredient objects containing all the ingredients in the shopping list.

    • getRecipes

      private List<Recipe> getRecipes(int userId)
      Returns a list of Recipe objects containing all the recipes in the shopping list.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user to retrieve the list for.
      Returns:
      a list of Recipe objects containing all the recipes in the shopping list.

    • getPortions

      public int getPortions(int userId, int recipeId)
      Returns amount of portions for a given recipe in the shopping list.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user to retrieve the portions for.
      recipeId - the id of the recipe to retrieve the portions for.
      Returns:
      the amount of portions in a recipe in the shopping list.

    • getIngredients

      private List<AmountedIngredient> getIngredients(int recipeId)
      Returns a list of AmountedIngredient objects containing all the ingredients in a recipe.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - the id of the recipe to retrieve the list of ingredients for.
      Returns:
      a list of summed amounts for each ingredient in a recipe.

    • retrieveIngredientById

      private Ingredient retrieveIngredientById(int ingredientId)
      Retrieves an ingredient by its id. If the ingredient does not exist, null is returned.
      Parameters:
      ingredientId - the id of the ingredient to retrieve.
      Returns:
      an ingredient object if the ingredient exists, otherwise null.
